title: Shigjeta LLC Official Website
description: The official website of Shigjeta LLC – a creative digital agency – designed to represent the brand's identity and services with clarity and impact. Built with React and Tailwind, the site delivers.

title: RonniCeramics Official Website
description: RonniCeramics is an elegant, product-focused website designed for a premium ceramic studio. Built with React and Tailwind, the site showcases handcrafted.

title: Kobags Group Official Website
description: Kobags is the official website of an eco-friendly bag manufacturer based in Kosovo. The platform was designed to communicate sustainability, product customization, and brand mission through a clean, modern.

title: Kobags Group Custom Bag Configurator
description: The Kobags Group Configurator allows users to personalize eco-friendly bags directly in the browser. Built with React and connected to Shopify, it features a dynamic live preview system.

title: RonniCeramics Product Configurator
description: The RonniCeramics Configurator allows customers to create fully customized ceramic orders by adjusting product size, glaze, and design. Beyond visual customization, users can input tire.

title: Inventory Management System
description: A robust web-based system for managing product inventory, orders, and sales data.

title: Smart Home Dashboard
description: An intuitive dashboard for controlling and monitoring various smart home devices.

title: Blog Platform
description: A minimalist blog platform built with server-side rendering and markdown support.
